Line 19: Line 19:
==History==
==History==
Acronis was founded as a privately owned company by the IT entrepreneurs Serguei Beloussov, Max Tsypliaev, and Ilya Zubarev in [[2001]]. The company originally focused on disk partitioning software and boot loader software, but eventually moved towards backup and disaster recovery by providing disk imaging technology. Until 2009 their flagship product line was Acronis True Image, which included utilities for both home users and enterprise environments, but has since been replaced in the corporate environment by Acronis Backup and Recovery 10.
Acronis was founded as a privately owned company by the IT entrepreneurs Serguei Beloussov, Max Tsypliaev, and Ilya Zubarev in [[2001]]. The company originally focused on disk partitioning software and boot loader software, but eventually moved towards backup and disaster recovery by providing disk imaging technology. Until 2009 their flagship product line was Acronis True Image, which included utilities for both home users and enterprise environments, but has since been replaced in the corporate environment by Acronis Backup and Recovery 10.

The software support is based in Russia- it is nearly impossible to understand the technicians and the quality of support is horrendous. They will not return your email or phone calls. This is a great idea but horrible investment. The owners should invest in quality technical support instead of "hurry and get that guy off of the phone and get to the next one" style.
